title: Fund tackling AIDS, TB, malaria seeks $18 bln to reverse COVID disruptions
description: At least $18 billion is needed to get the fight against malaria, tuberculosis and AIDS back on track from disruptions caused by the COVID-19 pandemic, a global health fund said on Wednesday.
